translations.en:
: ** ğŸ“¬ **Welcome!** ğŸ‘‘ The king searches for a mighty knight to marry his daughter and **you** have been chosen to be part of the selection contest! I'll be your partner for this journey, and I'll do my best to help you triumph!
ğŸš© Our goal for this game is to collect as many points as we can, to show the king our might! ğŸ’ª I'll explain how it works...
ğŸ“” Of course, I won't make a long and monotonous speech, so if you want more details, please use `!help`
So, let's start! It's pretty simple, I'll do whatever you ask! I'm going to collect resources ğŸ’° for you while you're gone, and you'll just have to use `!report` to get them. If I ever have problems, I'll ask you what to do and you'll help me continue!

ğŸš¶ Let's go!
